TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract serializable beforefieldinit Binder extends System.Object

summary.span: 从候选者列表中选择一个成员，并执行实参类型到形参类型的类型转换。

span.span: Selects a member from a list of candidates, and performs type conversion from actual argument type to formal argument type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现类由方法如，若要执行，从一组可能的成员选择基于组的参数类型和参数值;，这会选择基于参数类型; 等方法。Implementations of the class are used by methods such as , which selects from a set of possible members to execute, based on a set of parameter types and argument values; , which selects a method based on parameter types; and so on. 默认实现类提供的属性。A default implementation of the class is provided by the property. ## Examples 下面的示例实现，并演示的所有成员`Binder`类。The following example implements and demonstrates all members of the `Binder` class. 私有方法`CanConvertFrom`查找给定类型兼容的类型。The private method `CanConvertFrom` finds compatible types for a given type. [!code-cpp[Binder_1#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Binder_1/CPP/binder.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Binder_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Binder_1/CS/binder.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Binder_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Binder_1/VB/binder.vb#1)]

para.span: 继承自，必须重写以下成员： ， ， ， ， ，和。

span.span: When you inherit from , you must override the following members: , , , , , and .

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由派生类，来初始化此类型中的状态的构造函数调用此构造函数。This constructor is called by the constructors of derived classes, to initialize state in this type.

param.name: bindingAttr
param.span: 值的按位组合。

span.span: A bitwise combination of values.

param.name: match
param.span: 用于匹配的候选字段集。

span.span: The set of fields that are candidates for matching.

param.span: 例如，当 使用 对象时，此参数将指定反射已确定为可能匹配项的字段集，通常是因为它们有正确的成员名称。

span.span: For example, when a object is used by , this parameter specifies the set of fields that reflection has determined to be possible matches, typically because they have the correct member name.

param.span: 由 提供的默认实现会更改此数组的顺序。

span.span: The default implementation provided by changes the order of this array.

param.name: value
param.span: 用于定位匹配字段的字段值。

span.span: The field value used to locate a matching field.

param.name: culture
param.span: 一个 实例，用于在强制类型的联编程序实现中控制数据类型强制。

span.span: An instance of that is used to control the coercion of data types, in binder implementations that coerce types.

param.span: 如果 culture 为 ，则使用当前线程的 。

span.span: If culture is , the for the current thread is used.

param.span: 注意 例如，如果联编程序实现允许将字符串值强制转换为数值类型，则此参数对于将表示 1000 的 转换为 值是必需的，因为不同的区域性以不同的方式表示 1000。

span.span: Note For example, if a binder implementation allows coercion of string values to numeric types, this parameter is necessary to convert a that represents 1000 to a value, because 1000 is represented differently by different cultures.

param.span: 默认联编程序不进行此类字符串强制。

span.span: The default binder does not do such string coercions.

summary.span: 基于指定的判据，从给定的字段集中选择一个字段。

span.span: Selects a field from the given set of fields, based on the specified criteria.
The matching field.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`bindingAttr`不包括，提供的默认联编程序实现只是返回的第一个元素`match`。If `bindingAttr` does not include , the default binder implementation provided by simply returns the first element of `match`. 不进行选择。No selection is done. 此方法提供的绑定控件。This method controls the binding provided by .

exception.span: 对于默认的联编程序， 包括 ，并且 包含多个与 良好匹配且匹配程度相同的字段。

span.span: For the default binder, includes , and contains multiple fields that are equally good matches for .

exception.span: 例如， 包含一个实现 IMyClass 接口的 MyClass 对象，并且 包含一个类型为 MyClass 的字段和一个类型为 IMyClass 的字段。

span.span: For example, contains a MyClass object that implements the IMyClass interface, and contains a field of type MyClass and a field of type IMyClass.

exception.span: 对于默认联编程序， 包括 ，并且 不包含任何可接受 的字段。

span.span: For the default binder, includes , and contains no fields that can accept .

exception.span: 对于默认联编程序， 包括 ，并且 为 或一个空数组。

span.span: For the default binder, includes , and is or an empty array.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract System.Reflection.MethodBase BindToMethod (System.Reflection.BindingFlags bindingAttr, System.Reflection.MethodBase[] match, ref object[] args, System.Reflection.ParameterModifier[] modifiers, System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture, string[] names, out object state);

Public MustOverride Function BindToMethod (bindingAttr As BindingFlags, match As MethodBase(), ByRef args As Object(), modifiers As ParameterModifier(), culture As CultureInfo, names As String(), ByRef state As Object) As MethodBase

public: abstract System::Reflection::MethodBase ^ BindToMethod(System::Reflection::BindingFlags bindingAttr, cli::array <System::Reflection::MethodBase ^> ^ match, cli::array <System::Object ^> ^ % args, cli::array <System::Reflection::ParameterModifier> ^ modifiers, System::Globalization::CultureInfo ^ culture, cli::array <System::String ^> ^ names, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::Object ^ % state);

MemberSignature.Usage: binder.BindToMethod (bindingAttr, match, args, modifiers, culture, names, state)

param.name: bindingAttr
param.span: 值的按位组合。

span.span: A bitwise combination of values.

param.name: match
param.span: 用于匹配的候选方法集。

span.span: The set of methods that are candidates for matching.

param.span: 例如，当 使用 对象时，此参数将指定反射已确定为可能匹配项的方法集，通常是因为它们有正确的成员名称。

span.span: For example, when a object is used by , this parameter specifies the set of methods that reflection has determined to be possible matches, typically because they have the correct member name.

param.span: 由 提供的默认实现会更改此数组的顺序。

span.span: The default implementation provided by changes the order of this array.

param.name: args
param.span: 传入的参数。

span.span: The arguments that are passed in.

param.span: 联编程序可以更改此数组中的参数的顺序；例如，如果 names 参数用于指定位置顺序以外的顺序，则默认联编程序会更改参数的顺序。

span.span: The binder can change the order of the arguments in this array; for example, the default binder changes the order of arguments if the names parameter is used to specify an order other than positional order.

param.span: 如果联编程序实现强制转换参数类型，则也可以更改参数的类型和值。

span.span: If a binder implementation coerces argument types, the types and values of the arguments can be changed as well.

param.name: modifiers
param.span: 使绑定能够处理在其中修改了类型的参数签名的参数修饰符数组。

span.span: An array of parameter modifiers that enable binding to work with parameter signatures in which the types have been modified.

param.span: 默认的联编程序实现不使用此参数。

span.span: The default binder implementation does not use this parameter.

param.name: culture
param.span: 一个 实例，用于在强制类型的联编程序实现中控制数据类型强制。

span.span: An instance of that is used to control the coercion of data types, in binder implementations that coerce types.

param.span: 如果 culture 为 ，则使用当前线程的 。

span.span: If culture is , the for the current thread is used.

param.span: 注意 例如，如果联编程序实现允许将字符串值强制转换为数值类型，则此参数对于将表示 1000 的 转换为 值是必需的，因为不同的区域性以不同的方式表示 1000。

span.span: Note For example, if a binder implementation allows coercion of string values to numeric types, this parameter is necessary to convert a that represents 1000 to a value, because 1000 is represented differently by different cultures.

param.span: 默认联编程序不进行此类字符串强制。

span.span: The default binder does not do such string coercions.

param.name: names
param.span: 参数名（如果匹配时要考虑参数名）或 （如果要将变量视为纯位置）。

span.span: The parameter names, if parameter names are to be considered when matching, or if arguments are to be treated as purely positional.

param.span: 例如，如果没有按位置顺序提供变量，则必须使用参数名。

span.span: For example, parameter names must be used if arguments are not supplied in positional order.

param.name: state
param.span: 方法返回之后，state 包含一个联编程序提供的对象，用于跟踪参数的重新排序。

span.span: After the method returns, state contains a binder-provided object that keeps track of argument reordering.

param.span: 联编程序创建此对象，并且联编程序是此对象的唯一使用者。

span.span: The binder creates this object, and the binder is the sole consumer of this object.

param.span: 如果在返回 时 state 不为 ，若要将 args 还原为其原始顺序，必须将 state 传递给 方法，以便可以检索 参数（在 Visual Basic 中为 ）的值。

span.span: If state is not when returns, you must pass state to the method if you want to restore args to its original order, for example, so that you can retrieve the values of parameters ( parameters in Visual Basic).

summary.span: 基于提供的参数，从给定的方法集中选择要调用的方法。

span.span: Selects a method to invoke from the given set of methods, based on the supplied arguments.
The matching method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认联编程序会考虑这两个具有值的参数和`params`数组 (`ParamArray` Visual Basic 中的数组)。The default binder takes into account both parameters that have values and `params` arrays (`ParamArray` arrays in Visual Basic). 因此，很可能在情况下查找匹配项位置`args`和`match`不包含的元素数目。Thus, it is possible to find a match in cases where `args` and `match` do not contain the same number of elements. 此联编程序允许客户端将自变量数组映射回其原始形式，如果具有已由操作参数数组。The binder enables a client to map the array of arguments back to its original form if the argument array has been manipulated by . 使用此重新映射功能存在此类自变量时得到的引用参数。Use this remap capability to get back by-reference arguments when such arguments are present. 如果按名称传递自变量，则联编程序重新排序参数数组。When you pass arguments by name, the binder reorders the argument array. `state`会跟踪参数的参数重新排序，从而使绑定器的方法能够为其原始形式参数数组重新排序。The `state` parameter keeps track of argument reordering, thus enabling the binder's method to reorder the argument array to its original form. 方法由方法。The method is used by the method.

exception.span: 对于默认联编程序， 包含多个与 良好匹配且匹配程序相同的方法。

span.span: For the default binder, contains multiple methods that are equally good matches for .

exception.span: 例如， 包含一个实现 IMyClass 接口的 MyClass 对象，并且 包含一个采用 MyClass 的方法和一个采用 IMyClass 的方法。

span.span: For example, contains a MyClass object that implements the IMyClass interface, and contains a method that takes MyClass and a method that takes IMyClass.

exception.span: 对于默认联编程序， 不包含可以接受 中提供的参数的任何方法。

span.span: For the default binder, contains no methods that can accept the arguments supplied in .

exception.span: 对于默认联编程序， 为 或一个空数组。

span.span: For the default binder, is or an empty array.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool CanChangeType (object value, Type type, System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture);

param.name: value

param.name: type
param.span: value 将变成的新 。

span.span: The new that value will become.

param.name: culture
param.span: 一个 实例，用于控制数据类型的强制转换。

span.span: An instance of that is used to control the coercion of data types.

param.span: 如果 culture 为 ，则使用当前线程的 。

span.span: If culture is , the for the current thread is used.

param.span: 注意 例如，此参数对于将表示 1000 的 转换为 值是必需的，因为不同的区域性表示 1000 的形式不同。

span.span: Note For example, this parameter is necessary to convert a that represents 1000 to a value, because 1000 is represented differently by different cultures.

summary.span: 将给定 的类型更改为给定 。

span.span: Changes the type of the given to the given .

returns.span: 一个包含作为新类型的给定值的对象。

span.span: An object that contains the given value as the new type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 反射建模的通用类型系统的可访问性规则。Reflection models the accessibility rules of the common type system. 例如，如果调用方是在同一程序集中，调用方不需要特殊权限的内部成员。For example, if the caller is in the same assembly, the caller does not need special permissions for internal members. 否则，调用方需要。Otherwise, the caller needs . 这是与受保护的成员的查找一致、 专用和等。This is consistent with lookup of members that are protected, private, and so on. 一般原则是，`ChangeType`应执行仅扩大强制转换，永远不会丢失数据。The general principle is that `ChangeType` should perform only widening coercions, which never lose data. 扩大强制转换的示例将强制转换为 64 位有符号的整数的值将 32 位有符号的整数的值。An example of a widening coercion is coercing a value that is a 32-bit signed integer to a value that is a 64-bit signed integer. 这被有别于收缩强制转换，可能会丢失数据。This is distinguished from a narrowing coercion, which may lose data. 收缩强制转换的示例将强制转换为 32 位有符号整数的 64 位有符号的整数。An example of a narrowing coercion is coercing a 64-bit signed integer to a 32-bit signed integer. 下表列出了默认情况下执行的强制`ChangeType`。The following table lists the coercions performed by the default `ChangeType`. |源类型Source type|目标类型Target type| |-----------------|-----------------| |任何类型Any type|其基类型。Its base type.| |任何类型Any type|它实现的接口。The interface it implements.| |CharChar|UInt16、UInt32、Int32、UInt64、Int64、Single、DoubleUInt16, UInt32, Int32, UInt64, Int64, Single, Double| |ByteByte|Char、UInt16、Int16、UInt32、Int32、UInt64、Int64、Single、DoubleChar, UInt16, Int16, UInt32, Int32, UInt64, Int64, Single, Double| |SByteSByte|Int16、Int32、Int64、Single、DoubleInt16, Int32, Int64, Single, Double| |UInt16UInt16|UInt32、Int32、UInt64、Int64、Single、DoubleUInt32, Int32, UInt64, Int64, Single, Double| |Int16Int16|Int32、Int64、Single、DoubleInt32, Int64, Single, Double| |UInt32UInt32|UInt64、Int64、Single、DoubleUInt64, Int64, Single, Double| |Int32Int32|Int64、Single、DoubleInt64, Single, Double| |UInt64UInt64|Single、DoubleSingle, Double| |Int64Int64|Single、DoubleSingle, Double| |SingleSingle|DoubleDouble| |非引用Non-reference|按引用。By-reference.|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法控制提供的选项`GetProperty`方法`Type`。This method controls the selection provided by the `GetProperty` method on `Type`.
